thread.title: andy Tilbury
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by andy Tilbury

author: andy Tilbury
title: andy Tilbury
text: One of the three companies didnt show up for an appointment, the other two were very good. I am going with the Sunpower panels (327 W) with optimisers and Solaredge solution from Infinite Energy. V expensive but my roof space is limited and I live near the sea, so need robust top tier panels.
